positive_examples: This is an example of intelligence analysis process.
The intelligence analysis process demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed intelligence analysis process in this context.
A typical case of intelligence analysis process would involve these features.
The concept of intelligence analysis process applies here.
The systematic reasoning process of evaluating, interpreting, and synthesizing collected information to produce actionable intelligence.
negative_examples: This is an example of evasion planning process, not intelligence analysis process.
This represents tradecraft reasoning process in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: EvasionPlanningProcess, or other types of TradecraftReasoningProcess

definition: A systematic process of evaluating information to produce actionable intelligence assessments.
